name: The Lost Colour (Francisco Costa)
description:
This game was made in 48 hours for the Global Game Jam 2021 @Tecnico/Belas-Artes

In The Lost Colour, you play in both first person and aerial view, while solving ever changing mazes in order to add colour to what starts out as a monochromatic world.

A maze like game, while in first person can switch between colors and walk on the same plane. While on areal view can switch between planes but cannot change between colours. Press "SPACE" to change perspectives. "Q" to place markers and "E" to remove them. You start in a monochromatic, multilayered maze and your goal is to reach the middle and grab a heart. Afterward, the world gains colour and you need to solve the maze with the newly added colours. In this game you are on the hunt to bring the colour back into your life. Sometimes life can seem dull and gray but through persistence and flexible thinking you can turn it around and live colourfully. In this game, you can explore a brand new perspective based mechanic and puzzles that require outside the box thinking.
